# BacGWES

## Genomewide Epistasis Analysis on Bacteria

## Installation

`BacGWES` is currently available on github. It can be installed with `devtools`

```{r, eval = FALSE}
install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("Sudaraka88/BacGWES")
```
